title: How to Make Honey Roasted Nuts

steps.headline: Mix the honey, olive oil, salt and cayenne pepper together in a bowl.
Add the cashews and almonds and toss about in the mixture to coat the nuts.
Prepare a baking tray/sheet with parchment paper or non-stick surface.
steps.description: Spread the coated nuts across the tray/sheet.

steps.headline: Put into the oven and cook at 180ºC/350ºF for 15 minutes, or until golden brown.
Remove the nuts and allow to cool.
steps.description: Serve, or store in an airtight container.

text: Mix the honey, olive oil, salt and cayenne pepper together in a bowl.  Add the cashews and almonds and toss about in the mixture to coat the nuts.  Prepare a baking tray/sheet with parchment paper or non-stick surface. Spread the coated nuts across the tray/sheet. Put into the oven and cook at 180ºC/350ºF for 15 minutes, or until golden brown. Do not leave to blacken. Remove the nuts and allow to cool. Serve, or store in an airtight container. Finished.
